resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157007</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157007</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1036</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fun at the Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spaß am Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amusement au musée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divertimento no museu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divertimento al museo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασκέδαση στο μουσείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversión en el museo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will prepare a brochure for a museum from somewhere around the world, highlighting the special features of that museum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brochure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">museum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger bereiten eine Broschüre für ein 
Museum irgendwo herum von der Welt vor und markieren die speziellen 
Merkmale dieses Museums.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants prépareront une brochure pour un 
musée quelque part autour du monde, mettant en valeur usages 
spéciaux de ce musée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners prepararão um folheto para um museu 
em algum lugar ao redor do mundo, destacando as características 
especiais desse museu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti prepareranno un opuscolo per un 
museo in qualche luogo intorno dal mondo, evidenziante le 
caratteristiche speciali di quel museo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα προετοιμάσουν ένα φυλλάδιο για ένα 
μουσείο από κάπου σε όλο τον κόσμο, δίνοντας έμφαση στα ειδικά
χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα εκείνου του μουσείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes prepararán un folleto para un 
museo en alguna parte alrededor del mundo, destacando las 
características especiales de ese museo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Broschüre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Museum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">brochure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">folheto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">museu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">opuscolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">museo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυλλάδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">folleto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">museo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
